description: If n is composite, replace n by the concatenation of its proper divisors, otherwise a(n) = n.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: A037279 := proc(n) local dvs ; if isprime(n) or n = 1 then n; else dvs := [op(numtheory[divisors](n) minus {1,n} )] ; dvs := sort(dvs) ; cat(op(dvs)) ; fi ; end: seq(A037279(n),n=1..80) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 23 2007
mathematica: f[n_]:=If[PrimeQ[n],n,FromDigits[Flatten[IntegerDigits/@Rest[ Most[ Divisors[n]]]]]]; Join[{1},Array[f,50,2]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 24 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 29 2008 at the suggestion of _R. J. Mathar_
